content.question: His commota fugam Dido sociosque parabat. Conveniunt quibus aut odium crudele tyranni aut metus acer erat; naves, quae forte paratae, corripiunt onerantque1 auro. Portantur avari Pygmalionis opes pelago; dux femina facti. 1onero, -are: load Translate the passage above as literally as possible.
